Backup and restore system settings

Use Hitachi Virtual Appliance Manager to backup system settings before moving Storage Advisor to another instance.

The settings include configuration files, an email template file and an SQL file.

Procedure

  1. Open a browser and enter https://ip-address/vam/ to access the Virtual Appliance Manager and adjust the settings for your server environment.

    • User name: service

    • Password: Chang3Me!

  2. Click Backup to download a ZIP file containing system settings.
  3. When you are ready to restore, log in to Virtual Appliance Manager
  4. Click Restore and either drag and drop the backup file or click the plus sign (+).
  5. Click Submit.
  • System settings included in backup
